message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $12000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you is $10000. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I am only able to commit to a maximum of $10000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11500. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I still cannot exceed my budget of $10000. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
